title: Can't log in
body: It just keeps getting stuck on "Logging in" and later says "Connection error". Is this related to the server problem? or is it just me?

replies.body: not just you bro, I couldn't connect to my match, now I keep disconnecting from pvp.net whenever i try to login.

Riot said they are aware (Is on launch screen up top - exclamation mark).

Happened to me - got dc'd after game (Couldn't view stats) - not unable to login.
